channel.title: Help please?
channel.description: well i need help with me server...againn..its going swell but i need to have like these two npc's telling wether im online or not standing outside of the training area at varrock infron of the window or those brown things.I need help so some1 please post directions on how to do it..please and ty cuz im new at this.=)

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Do what he said, and then add the npc who’s id you entered above into the autospawn wherever you want him to be.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCIDHERE)
					{
						if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
						{
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("PERSON"))
							{
								npcs[i].textUpdate = "PERSON is online!";
							}
							else
							{
								npcs[i].textUpdate = "PERSON is offline!";
							}
												}
			}

Then go and add to autospawn.

Read full topic
